text: "Daniel" is a 1973 song by Elton John. It was taken from his sixth studio album Don't Shoot Me I'm Only the Piano Player. It went to number 2 in the United States, Zimbabwe and New Zealand, number 1 in Canada and number 4 in the United Kingdom and Ireland. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1974. It was later covered by Wilson Phillips. title: Daniel (Elton John song)
